pageContext.claim: “They gave General Flynn a great deal because they were embarrassed by the way he was treated - the FBI said he didn't lie and they overrode the FBI. They want to scare everybody into making up stories that are not true by catching them in the smallest of misstatements. Sad!”
pageContext.analysis: The special counsel said Flynn should receive no jail time because of his extensive cooperation. The FBI agents thought he did not seem like someone who was lying, but Flynn admitted in court that he did lie to the FBI about his contacts with a Russian official.
